renderedFields.description: Here's our Banking Platform Implementation Guide that provides details on how to integrate Pinwheel with your platform. I believe that among the three implementation pathways outlined in this doc, the relevant one here for Tyfone is the "custom implementation". Happy to answer questions as they come up, or we can wait for the kick-off call.

comments.body:
Update from Vendor:

Here's our Banking Platform Implementation Guide that provides details on how to integrate Pinwheel with your platform. I believe that among the three implementation pathways outlined in this doc, the relevant one here for Tyfone is the "custom implementation". Happy to answer questions as they come up, or we can wait for the kick-off call.

Manjunath Prasad Please assign a Engg lead.

cc: Prashant Karpe Ashish Behera
Moving to backlog as per KT's updates on 30th of June 2025. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kr8LQSqr-uW2OvWOuvCox2T3R8NoK-ucVkzBSjz1YOQ/edit?tab=t.5oruuur8qm4f

HiPrashant Karpe Dinesh Shilpi ,

ELGA would like to start focusing on this integration.

Attn: Himanshu Srivastava

Himanshu Srivastava
🔔 Action Required: Update Missing Critical Fields

One or more critical fields need to be updated for this ticket.

Details:

  • Ticket: PROD-542 5. Requirements Review - Direct Deposit Switch | Pinwheel
  • Current Status: 09. Requirements | ENG Review

Missing Fields:
• Engineering Lead: ❌ Not set
• T-shirt Size: ❌ Not set
• Customer Name: ❌ Not set
• Product: ❌ Not set
• Platform: ❌ Not set
• Product Area: ❌ Not set
• Category: ❌ Not set
• Source: ❌ Not set
• SOW | Project: ❌ Not set

Please update these fields to ensure proper tracking and planning.
Aaryan Shinde Himanshu Srivastava https://tyfone.atlassian.net/browse/NFIN-40030?focusedCommentId=911582

items.toString: This work item relates to PDEL-50158
This work item is connected to PROD-1171
This work item is connected to PROD-1272
This work item is connected to PROD-1033
This work item is implemented by NFIN-40030

Here's our [Banking Platform Implementation Guide|https://docs.pinwheelapi.com/public/docs/banking-platform-implementation-guide] that provides details on how to integrate Pinwheel with your platform. I believe that among the three implementation pathways outlined in this doc, the relevant one here for Tyfone is the "[custom implementation|https://docs.pinwheelapi.com/public/docs/banking-platform-implementation-guide#custom-implementation-1]". Happy to answer questions as they come up, or we can wait for the kick-off call.
